an3.99:1.1: “Navopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubbanno ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca;
an3.99:1.2: majjhimopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubbanno ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca;
an3.99:1.3: jinnopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubbanno ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca.
an3.99:1.4: Jinnampi, bhikkhave, potthakam ukkhaliparimajjanam va karonti sankarakute va nam chaddenti.
an3.99:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, navo cepi bhikkhu hoti dussilo papadhammo.
an3.99:2.3: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, potthako dubbanno tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:2.4: Ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupasanti ditthanugatim apajjanti, tesam tam hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
an3.99:2.6: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, potthako dukkhasamphasso tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:2.7: Yesam kho pana so patigganhati civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam, tesam tam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam.
an3.99:2.9: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, potthako appaggho tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:2.11: thero cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti dussilo papadhammo, idamassa dubbannataya vadami.
an3.99:2.12: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, potthako dubbanno tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:2.13: Ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupasanti ditthanugatim apajjanti, tesam tam hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
an3.99:2.15: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, potthako dukkhasamphasso tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:2.16: Yesam kho pana so patigganhati civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam, tesam tam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam.
an3.99:2.18: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, potthako appaggho tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:3.1: Evarupo cayam, bhikkhave, thero bhikkhu sanghamajjhe bhanati.
an3.99:3.3: ‘kim nu kho tuyham balassa abyattassa bhanitena,
an3.99:3.5: So kupito anattamano tatharupim vacam nicchareti yatharupaya vacaya sangho tam ukkhipati, sankarakuteva nam potthakam.
an3.99:4.1: Navampi, bhikkhave, kasikam vattham vannavantanceva hoti sukhasamphassanca mahagghanca; majjhimampi, bhikkhave, kasikam vattham vannavantanceva hoti sukhasamphassanca mahagghanca; jinnampi, bhikkhave, kasikam vattham vannavantanceva hoti sukhasamphassanca mahagghanca.
an3.99:4.2: Jinnampi, bhikkhave, kasikam vattham ratanapalivethanam va karoti gandhakarandake va nam pakkhipanti.
an3.99:5.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, navo cepi bhikkhu hoti silava kalyanadhammo, idamassa suvannataya vadami.
an3.99:5.2: Seyyathapi tam, bhikkhave, kasikam vattham vannavantam tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:5.3: Ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupasanti ditthanugatim apajjanti, tesam tam hoti digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
an3.99:5.5: Seyyathapi tam, bhikkhave, kasikam vattham sukhasamphassam tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:5.6: Yesam kho pana so patigganhati civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharam, tesam tam mahapphalam hoti mahanisamsam.
an3.99:5.8: Seyyathapi tam, bhikkhave, kasikam vattham mahaggham tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami.
an3.99:5.10: thero cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti …pe… puggalam vadami.
an3.99:6.1: Evarupo cayam, bhikkhave, thero bhikkhu sanghamajjhe bhanati.
an3.99:6.3: ‘appasadda ayasmanto hotha, thero bhikkhu dhammanca vinayanca bhanati’ti.
